roleset.name: usual, average, widespread
roleset.note: COMMON-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from common.01-j)

role.descr: entity observing, perceiving arg1 as common

example.name: both args
example.text: Multimorbidity is common to family practice: is it commonly researched?

example.name: arg1, EXT, LOC
example.text: Violence against women is extremely common all over the world.

roleset.name: negative connotation: course, lowly
roleset.note: COMMON-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from common.02-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: But throughout its history Athens despised hand work and made it clear than the handworker was common and vulgar.

roleset.name: shared by
roleset.note: COMMON-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from common.03-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: The macromolecule RNA is common to all living.
